V1C0L10: K'umukino w'inahamake ( ama karita yose atakoreshejwe), wakuramo ama karita 10,14,15,41 na 42
V1C0L15: Amakarita yawe yose ari mu biganza!
V1C0L6: Ukeneye ipaki imwe yamakarita kuri buri kipe (abantu 4 kugeza kuri 7), urupapuro rwa 1 x 2 m, amakaramu y'ibiti, gome ihanagura, n'amakaramu ya marikeri na papiye kora
V1C0L7: Intego yumukino ni uko buri kipe ishushanya inkuru y’imihindagurikire y’ikirere itegura amakarita ku meza, ukurikije impamvu n'ingaruka, no gushushanya ibimenyetso byerekana isano iri hagati yamakarita.
V1C0L8: Tegereza ko ikipe ishyira mumwanya ama karita yose y'ikiciro cya mbere yatanzwe mbere yo kujya kukindi kiciro
V1C0L9: Kubara igihe: Iminota 90 yo gukina amakarita no kugirango ama karita atondekwe neza, Iminota 20-30 yo gushushanya neza amasano, iminota10 yo gusangiza abandi ibyiyumvo nibyo mwagezeho muitisnda nindi minota 45-60  yo kungurana ibitekerezo kungamba zafatwa!
V1C10L2: Ibyuka bya Ayerosolo, ni ibyuka byangiza ikirere bikomoka ku ngufu z'ibishanguka zitatwitswe neza. Ibibyuka ni bibi k'ubuzima bwa muntu kuko bibyara ubukonje mu kirere bityo bigatera imihindagurikire y'ibihe.
V1C11L2: Hafi y'icya kabiri cy'ibyuka bihumanya ikirere biragaruka bigakoreshwa n'ibimera n'inyanja k'uburyo biba bitacyangije ikirere. Ikindi gice kikaguma mu kirere. Kuva mumyaka 150 ishize, Ubwiganze bw'ibyo byuka mu mwuka duhumeka bwiyongereye kuva ku kigero cya 280 kugera kuri 415 (Mu buryo bapima ibyuka bita ppm). Iki kigero kiri hejuru cyane ugereranyije n'uko cyiyongereye mu myaka miliyoni 3 ishize.
V1C12L1: Uburyo bwa kamere bwo kugabanya ibyuka byangiza ikirere
V1C12L2:
kimwe cya kabiri cy'ibyuka bya karubonike buri mwaka bitunganywa n'uburyo bwa kamere k'uburyo bitangiza:
-1/4 Gikoreshwa n'ibimera mu gukora ibibitunga (Photosyntèse)
- 1/4 Gikoreshwa n'inyanja 
1/2 gisigaye kiguma mu kirere
V1C12L9: Kubara ibyuka bya gazi karubonike bikomoka kubikorwa bya muntu buri mwaka
V1C13L2:
"Ibyuka bihumanya ikirere bibaho muburyo bwa kamere-- cyangwa se ari ingaruka z'ibyakozwe. Ibyuka bihumanya akenshi bijya mukirere ari umwuka. Hatabayeho ibyuka byangiza ikirere, isi ya yagira ubukonje bwiyongereyeho 33oC kuburyo n'ubuzima butashoboka. 
Ariko, gazi karubonike n'ibindi byuka bihumanya bikomoka kubikorwa bya muntu, bituma ikigero cyibyo byuka kiyongera bigatera imihindagurikire y'ibihe."
V1C13L4: Gusubira mu kirere k'ubushyuhe buturuka ku zuba
V1C13L5: Ikigero cy'ubushyuhe bw'izuba twumva k'umubiri wacu cg kukintu icyo ari cyose ubushyuhe bw'izuba bugeraho
V1C14L2: bisobanura uko ubushyuhe cyangwa ingufu z'ikomoka ku zuba zisarangwanywa kuisi bitewe n'imbaraga zizikwirakwiza. izi ngufu zituma amazi y'inyanja ashyuha, urubura rugashonga, zikinjira mu butaka, kandi zigatuma ikirere gishyuha.
V1C15L11: Ibyuka bya gazi karubonike bituma urubura ( neige) ruba umukara
V1C15L2: Imbaraga zikwirakwiza ubushyuhe ku isi nigipimo kikinyuranyo kiri hagati y'ubushyuhe bwoherezwa ku isi n'ubushyuhe buyigeraho buri segonda. Buri ku kigero cya 2.8 W/m2  , 3.8 W/m2 uvuye kubyuka byangiza ikirerere  na -1W/M2 uvuye kubyuka bya Ayerosolo (Mu bipimo byifashishwa mu gupima izo mbaraga).
V1C15L21: Ibyuka bya Ayerosol bigira ingaruka ako kanya
V1C15L22: Ibyuka bya Ayerosol bigira ingaruka nyuma y'igihe kirekire
V1C15L30: Ibyangiza ikirere byose bikomoka kubikorwa bya muntu
V1C16L2: Urubura hafi ya rwose rwatakaje ireme ryarwo. Ndetse rwinshi amagana muri rwo ntirukiriho, nyamara kandi urwo rubura rugira akamaro ko gutunganya amazi meza akoreshwa
V1C17L2: Inyanja zikoresha 91% by'ubushyuhe bwo ku isi. Bityo rero, ubushyuhe bw'amazi bwarazamutse, cyane cyane ayegereye ubutaka. Amazi arisandaza/yikwiza hose uko ashyuha.
V1C18L2: Gushonga kw'urubura rw'inyanja, ntibituma amazi yayo azamuka. Ahubwo, iyo ashonga, aho avuye haba ubusa hakuzuramo imirasire y'izuba
V1C19L2: Urubura ruherereye mu bice by'amajyaruguru y'isi bita "ubutaka bw'icyatsi kibisi (greenland soma Girini landi) na Antarikitika ( aho hantu banahita urubura rw'umugabane). Urwo rubura ruramutse rushonze, byatera izamuka ry'amazi y'inyanja kukigero cya metero 7 k'Ubutaka bw'icyatsi kibisi (greenland) na metero 54 kwa Antarikita. Mu gihe cya mbere na mbere cy'urubura,  urubura ruherereye mu bice byo mu majyaruguru y'isi rwari runini, ugereranyije n'ikigero/ubutumburuke bw'inyanja, kuko kugeza ubu rwagabanutseho metero 120 zose.
V1C20L2: Amazi ashyushye hamwe numwuka ushyushye bitera gushyuha kw'inyanja no gushyuha kw'ikirere bituma hazamuka urwokotsi rwinshi mu kirere, bituma haba ibicu nabyo bibyara imvura. Nyamara iyo urwo rwokotsi (Evaporation) rubereye kuisi, byumisha ubutaka.
V1C21L2: Aha turavuga kuzamuka kw'ubushyuhe ku isi, muri rusange bwiyongereyeho  ku kigero cya 1,2 degere celius (1.2°C) kuva mu 1990.Imibare y'iteganyagihe, yerekana ko iki kigero  kizazamuka
V1C21L6: Guhinduka kw'ubushyuhe ku isi hagari ya 1850 na 1900
V1C21L8: Igipimo gishingiye kubyatewe n'uburyo kamere n'ibikorwa bya muntu
V1C21L9: Igipimo gishingiye ku byatewe n'uburyo kamere gusa (izuba n'ibirunga)
V1C22L2: Kuva mu 1900, Inyanja yazamutse ku kigero cya  centimetero 20 (20 cm)
V1C23L2: Iyi ubusharire (PH) bugabanutse, ibinyabuzima bifite igihu kigizwe na kalikere ntago bibasha gukura no kwiyongera ( urugero ibinyamujionjorerwa)
V1C24L2: Iyo umwuka wa karubonike uyengeye mu nyanja, uhindukamo undi utundu duce tw'umwuka bita H2CO3 na HCO3-. Ibi bituma inyanja irushaho kugira aside kandi ubusharire bikagabanuka.
V1C24L3: Kwiyongera kwa aside mu nyanja bitewe n' ubusharire ( PH)
V1C25L2: Inyamaswa n'ibimera bigerwaho n'ingaruka kubera guhindagurika kw'ubushyuhe n'uruhererekane rw'ubwisubire bw'amazi (Water cycle). Birimuka bigahunga cyangwa gucyendera bikanashiraho.Bicye cyane bishobora kunamba bikanakomeza kwiyongera.
V1C26L2: Guhungabana kw'amazi y'inyana bishobora gutuma yiyongera cyangwa agabanuka.Invura nyinshi ishobora gutera imyuzure. Iyo ubutaka bwumagaye, bitera ikibazo kuko amazi abushiramo akigendera.
V1C27L2: Ibinyabuzima biba hasi mu ndiba y'inyanja nibyo byokurya bitunze ibindi binyabuzima byo mu mazi. Iyo bihungabanye n'ibyo binyabuzima bindi nabyo birahungabana.Kuzamuka kw'ubushyuhe bw'amazi y'inyanja nabyo bihungabanya ibinyabuzima.
V1C28L2: Kubera kwiyongera kw'ubushyuhe, inyamaswa zirimuka cg zigahunga. Zimwe murizo zishobora gutera indwara igihe zigeze mu baturage batangiwe izo ndwara cyangwa imibiri yabo idashoboye guhangana nazo
V1C29L1: Ibinyabuzima bito byo mu mazi bita Piteropode n'ibindi bita Kokolitofore.
V1C29L2: Piteropode ni utunyabuzima tw'udusimba tureremba mu mazi naho Kokolithofore ni utunyabuzima tw'ibimera natwo tuba mu mazi y'inyanja cyangwa andi mazi meza
V1C2L2: Inganda zikoresha ibikomoka kuri Peterori n'umuriro, ibyuka byazo bigira uruhare mu kwangiza ikirere kukigero cya 40%.
V1C30L2: Guhindagurika kw'uruhererekane rw'ubwisubire bw'amazi bishobora gutera ubwiyongere  cyangwa kubanuka kw'imvura. Kugabanuka kw'imvura bitera "amapfa" kandi hari ibyago byinshi ko mugihe kizaza hazaba ibihe byinshi by'amapfa.
V1C31L2: Amasoko y'amazi meza agirwaho ingaruka n'ihindagurika kw'imigwire y'imvura no gushonga kw'urubura kandi aribyo bigenda ingano y'amazi y'imigezi.
V1C32L2: Umusaruro w'ubuhinzi ushobora kugerwaho n'ingaruka zitewe n'ubushyuhe, amapfa, ibihe bidasanzwe n' imyuzure (urugero mu bibaya bya Nili)
V1C33L2: Inkubi z'imiyaga zikomeye, zishobora gutera umwuka muke ( low presure). Urugero ni uko Hegitopasikali 1 y'umwuka itera kuzamuka kw'amazi y'inyanja ho cm 1. Bityo rero inkubi z'umuyaga zishobora gutera kurengerwa kw'inkombe z'inyanja bikongerwa ubukana no Kuzamuka kw'inyanja gusanzwe kwatewe n'ubushyuhe.
V1C34L2: Inkubi z'umuyaga zongerwa ubukana n'ubushyuhe bw'amazi yo ku nkombe z'inyanja.Iyo nkubi zongera ubukana kubera kwiyongera kw'ubushyuhe ku isi.
V1C35L2: Iyo miriro ya Nyakanga ikunda kuza mugihe cy'amapfa n'impeshyi
V1C36L2: Ikimenyetso cyo kwiyongera kw'igipimo cy'ubushyuhe ni ukwiyongera kw'ibihe bifita ubushyuhe bwinshi
V1C37L2: Inzara zishobora guterwa no kugabanuka ry'umusaruro w'ubuhinzi ndetse no kwangirika kw'urusobe rw'ibinyabuzima byo mu mazi
V1C38L2: Inzara, ibyanduza indwara, ibihe by'ubushyuye n'intambara bigira ingaruka mbi k'ubuzima bwa muntu
V1C39L2: Imihindagurikire y’ibihe byanze bikunze izatuma ahantu hanini hadaturwa kandi abantu bazahatirwa kwimuka.
V1C3L2: Icyiciro cy'ibijyanye n'ubwubatsi bw'amazu y'ubucuruzi bikoresha ibikomoka kuri peterori n'amashanyarazi. Ibyuka byabyo bigira uruhare mu kwangiza ikirere kukigero cya 20%.
V1C40L2: Ibi nibyo tugomba kwirinda ko bigera aha...
V1C41L1: Igice kiri munsi y'ubutaka kigizwe n'ubutaka bukonje cyane usanga mu bice by'impera y'isi (permafrost soma perimaforositi)
V1C41L2: Perimaforositi ni ubutaka buhora ari urubura. Butangiye kugenda bushonga bwohereza mu kirere gazi karubonike ikomoka ku bishanguka.Ibi bituma ibyuka bya Gazi karubinike isubira mu kirere ikiyongera nko mugihe cy'imiriro ya Nyakanga cg gushonga kw'urubura rw'inyanja,
V1C42L1: Perimaforositi ni ubutaka buhora ari urubura. Butangiye kugenda bushonga bwohereza mu kirere gazi karubonike ikomoka ku bishanguka.Ibi bituma ibyuka bya Gazi karubinike isubira mu kirere ikiyongera nko mugihe cy'imiriro ya Nyakanga cg gushonga kw'urubura rw'inyanja,
V1C4L2: Ubwikorezi bukoresha cyane ibikomoka kuri peteroli. ibyuka bibukomokaho bigira uruhare mukwangiza ikirere kukigero cya 15%.
V1C5L2: Izongufu zikomoka ku bishanguka harimo nyiramugengeri, ibikomoka kuri peteroli na gazi. Bikoreshwa by'umwihariko mu bwubatsi, mu bwikorezi no mu nganda. Iyo bitwitswe birekura gazi karubonike (Ibyuka bihumanya abantu: Co2)
V1C5L4: Miliyari z'ama toni ya gazi karubonike k'umwaka
V1C6L2: Gutema amashyamba bisobanura gutema cyangwa gutwika ibiti kuburyo ishyamba ritongera gushibuka. 80% y'amashyamba ararimbwurwa kandi  biterwa n'iterambere ry'ubuhinzi.
V1C7L1: Ibyuka bya Gazi karubonike bijya mu kirere
V1C7L2: ibyuka bya gazi karubonike  bikomoka cyane cyane kubikorwa bya muntu. Ibyo byuka bikomoka bijya mu kirere, bikomoka kugukoresha ingufu z'ibishanguka no kwangiza amashyamba.
V1C7L5: Gazi karubonike ikomoka kubikorwa bya muntu ( ikigero k'umwaka GtC/Yr)
V1C8L2:
Ibikorwa by'ubuhinzi ntabwo byohereza mukirere Gazi karubonik nyinshi, ariko byohereza ikigero kinini cy'umwuka wa metani (Kubera ibikorwa by'ubworozi no kubora kw'ibisigazwa by'ubuhinzi) n'undi mwuka witwa notorosi (ikomoka kumafumbire mvaruganda).
Muri rusange ibikorwa by'ubuhinzi byohereza mu kirere ibyuka bihumanya ku kigero cya 25% ubariyemo n'ingaruka zo kwangiza amashyamba.
V1C999L2: Amashusho-nyoborabiganiro ku mihindagurikire y'ibihe, yateguwe na Cédrik Ringenbanch. Ikwirakwizwa ryayo ritangirwa uburenganzira n'umuryango uharanira inyungu rusange witwa " La freque du Climat-soma la Furesiki di Kilima"
